headline: Shutdown sports events globally to save the planet?
description:
There are many ideas suggested a greener globe.

What about shutting down all sports evens across the globe?

There are a lot of them, ususally weekly, usually more, in most cities at least of some size.

There are huge climate costs.

Most studiums use a lot of electricty Most have lights,food prep, cold drinks, usually in disposable contrainers.

Some places that are huge have ACs

Then there is the enormous activity of getting people there and back again.

What impact do you think that might have on gobal emissions?
